title: Drawing, "Decoration of a lateral panel of a coach", 1650–75
medium: Brush and gray watercolor, pen and ink, black chalk on paper.
provenance: Given by the Misses Hewitt from the Collection of Mrs. Abram S. Hewitt.
creditline: Gift of Eleanor and Sarah Hewitt from the collection of Mrs. Abram S. Hewitt
description: Vertical drawing  of a side panel of a coach.  "Autumn" is shown seated in clouds.  A putto standing at right beside her, wing-like, brought her a bowl with fruits.  She raises her left hand with a bunch.  She is crowned with a wreath.

tombstone.epitaph:
Drawing, "Decoration of a lateral panel of a coach", 1650–75.
1650–75. Brush and gray watercolor, pen and ink, black chalk on paper.. Gift of Eleanor and Sarah Hewitt from the collection of Mrs. Abram S. Hewitt. 1931-70-23.
